definition: to be narrowly partisan/to unite with those of the same views but alienate those with different views
to cut down/to fell/to dispatch an expedition against/to attack/to boast/Taiwan pr. [fa1]

sentences.english: It's human nature, the author acknowledges, to want to be around people who are like ourselves.
sentences.chinese: 他承認，黨同伐異是人類的本性。
